about: Aim to become a Front-end Architect
career: During career at Alibaba, served as a front-end development/delivery engineer, participating in the construction of internal performance platforms internally, providing front-end solutions for delivery projects externally, and writing code to achieve service fulfillment.
schoolwork: During university, served as the project team leader and participated in the design and front-end development of multiple projects, Learned good overall planning, cooperation and communication skills. Passed CET-4 and CET-6. Received school-level scholarships in all academic years.

education.school: University of Electronic Science and Technology

experience.description: Alibaba Cloud - System Engineering Technology. Undertake the development of Yunqiao platform internally, and participate in the delivery performance of projects such as China Nuclear Power Unified R&D Platform and Guiyang Airport Qianyunyigou
Alibaba Cloud - Global Technical Service. Undertake the development of GTS workbench

Storage Business Infrastructure - Container Platform. Responsible for refactoring and developing CDBI. Build and deploy independent verification environments, write scripts and several blogs. Awarded as Star of Huawei Storage (top 20%)

projects.description: As the front-end owner, responsible for the development and maintenance of Yunqiao Workshop and Yunqiao Asset Market, and participate in the baseline development and customized development of commercial versions. Improve the experience and optimize the performance of the Domain-Driven Design diagram editor in the platform. Front-end

Implemented based on AntV X6, which arranges server-side task execution logic in a drag-and-drop manner. Supports the use of multiple running logics such as serial and parallel, supports the configuration of different task nodes such as Shell and Python, and supports legality check and automatic arrangement of nodes. Front-end

Participate in the official website upgrade project of Alibaba Damo Academy and Yunqiao, responsible for the transformation and development of the login registration module and personal account management module. Front-end

projects.shortIntro: Online repair system for dormitory network of UESTC
projects.description: Network users can submit repair orders online and track the progress. Solvers can accept orders, add processing information, and view order progress logs. Full stack

Use Markdown to write news and blogs, provide navigation links to various services, and better show the elegant demeanor of the LUG. The design refers to the official website of Tsinghua University TUNA Association. Full stack
A client designed for the families of lost elderly people and volunteers looking for the lost. Use Lark for information synchronization and intelligence aggregation. Front-end

A WeChat Mini Program for Collaborative To-Do Affairs for College Students Driven by the Curriculum. Join the class, share the schedule, to-do affairs and public affairs with your classmates. Front-end

An Electron application based on the EfficientIR that supports finding duplicate image pairs and searching for similar results of a specified image
The Chinese translation of the open source tutorial Design Patterns For Humans, for reference in learning design patterns
Develop new features (such as dark mode), improve mobile adaptation, fix known issues -- help the theme become better
